title: Benazir Dialysis Centre & Blood Bank termed Fateh Jangâ€™s biggest recent project: Governor Punjab
content:
ATTOCK, Nov 3 (APP):The establishment of the Shaheed Mohtarma Benazir Dialysis Centre and Blood Bank in Fateh Jang is the biggest recent development project completed in the area, Governor Punjab Sardar Salim Haider Khan said while addressing at the PPP Secretariat.

According to APP correspondent, he said serving humanity, ensuring relief and resolving public issues without discrimination remains his foremost priority.

The Governor said despite non-availability of government development funds, major facilitation initiatives in education, health and civic services are being executed through self-generated resources.

He said installation of solar systems on water supply schemes, expansion of school buildings, provision of learning facilities, street development and drainage improvement have been carried out across Fateh Jang, Pindigheb and Jand, while multiple mega schemes have already been completed.

A large number of citizens, party workers and local representatives attended the kachehri. The governor listened to collective and individual complaints and issued on-spot directions to relevant authorities for immediate redress.

Sardar Salim said his son Sardar Faizan Haider Khan and his team remain in continuous contact with the public and are working round the clock to address constituency-level challenges at grassroots.
